name: One Hell Of A Time
description:
You are a little soul that was sent to Hell by mistake, unfortunately, it seems that the devil will not let you go without a fight !

**Every Ten Seconds** he will spawn portal and minions, as well as destroying the Arena.

But you are not alone !

God himself is paying attention to the fight and will regenerate some of the tiles that were lost before as well as giving you power-ups to beat the Devil as well as giving you a different weapon **every Ten Seconds !**

I was alone when making this game, this is my second Ludum Dare and this was an absolute blast !!!!

Thank you for playing it !!!!

CONTROLS:

-   W A S D to move

- Right Click to fire

- Mouse to aim!

- Left Shift to use the item in slot 1

- Space to use the item in slot 2
